columns.description: Indicates the format submission type for the assignment being submitted. Values for this column include File, Text, On Paper, and Observed.

All historical data is populated 30 to 60 days after the November 2021/20.21.11 release.

Competency Activities.name: Competency Activities
Competency Activities.description: The Competency Activities Brightspace Data Set retrieves the data required to associate rubrics with competency activities. Using the returned data, clients can validate that they have configured the associations correctly.

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the activity associated with the competency. Can join with Competency Activity Results, Activity Exemptions Log, SCORM Objectives, SCORM Activity Attempts, SCORM Interactions, and SCORM Interaction Attempts.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Identifier for the Org Unit associated with the competency.

columns.name: ActivityName
columns.description: The name of the activity.

columns.name: ActivityTypeId
columns.description: Identifier for the activity type

columns.name: AssessmentType
columns.description: Rubric assessment type

columns.name: ObjectLookupId
columns.description: Lookup object id that is associated with the object.

columns.name: RubricId
columns.description: Identifier of the rubric. This field is only valid for competency activities associated with a rubric. Field can be null.

columns.name: LevelId
columns.description: Identifier of the rubric level associated with the competency activity. This field is only valid for competency activities associated with a rubric. Field can be null.

columns.name: RubricCriterionId
columns.description: Identifier of the rubric criterion associated with the activity. This field is only valid for competency activities associated with a rubric and scored at the criteria level. If the overall rubric score is used, the value is null.

columns.name: AssessmentThresholdCriteria
columns.description: For numeric activity only. Can be >= (greater than or equal to), > (greater than), = (equal to), <= (less than or equal to), or < (less than). Field can be null.

columns.name: AssessmentThreshold
columns.description: When a competency activity is evaluated, the assessment threshold is the value that must be met by a learner to achieve the competency. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsAutoEval
columns.description: Indicates if this competency is automatically evaluated. If this is false, the competency is a manual evaluation.

columns.name: RubricName

Content Files Properties Log.name: Content Files Properties Log
Content Files Properties Log.description: In the Content Files Properties Log Brightspace Data Set, each row represents a change (created, edited, or deleted) to a file that is linked to a content object within an org unit. The data set only captures changes to content files from July 2022 onwards. Q: Does this data set provide the size of all files within Brightspace?A: No. This data set only provides data on files associated with content objects. Additionally, it only surfaces data for newly uploaded, edited, or deleted files (associated with content) starting with the release of the data set in July 2022. It does not provide any historical data. Q: Are Active and Inactive courses included in the data?A: Yes. As long as the files are associated with a content object, it doesn't matter whether the course is active or inactive. Q: Are all file formats included in the data?A: Yes, all file formats are included when associated with a content object. However, please be aware that this data set does NOT include files that are embedded within an HTML content object. Q: If courses are copied (via Course Copy or CCS) or imported, will files associated with the newly created course be included in the data?A: Yes, files that are associated with content objects within a copied or imported course are surfaced in the data set with "Created" in the Action field.

columns.name: ScoreCalculationMethod
columns.description: Method used to calculate score. Strings are predefined, with the following values:Average - Calculates the score from the average score of each post in the topic made by a user. Max - Calculates the score based on the maximum score of any one post in the topic for a user.Min - Calculates the score based on the minimum score of any one post in the topic for a user.Mode Max - Given the number of posts, selects the score that is repeated the most. If there is a tie, it takes the highest score.Mode Min - Given the number of posts, selects the score that is repeated the most. If there is a tie, it takes the lowest score.Sum - Calculates the score from the sum of scores on each post in a topic for a user.Blank value (null) - The score is not calculated based on the scores of each post (Manual updates).

columns.name: IncludeNonScoredValues
columns.description: Indicates whether to include non-scored values.					True posts that have not been scored are scored as 0. Otherwise, posts without a score are not included in the score aggregate (defined in the ScoreCalculationType).

columns.description: Date the grade object was soft deleted. Field can be null.

columns.name: DeletedByUserId
columns.description: ID of the user who deleted the grade object. Field can be null.

columns.name: ResultId
columns.description: Unique release condition result identifier. Field can be null.

Grade Objects Log.name: Grade Objects Log
Grade Objects Log.description: The Grade Objects Log Brightspace Data Set returns a log of all changes to grades for each applicable user in the organization.

columns.name: LogId
columns.description: Unique grade object log identifier.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Name of the action. Field can be null.

columns.name: GradeObjectId
columns.description: Grade object identifier.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the user who completed the action.

columns.name: GradeSymbolString
columns.description: Value of the grade. Field can be null.

columns.name: PointsDenominator
columns.description: Total number of points possible. Field can be null.

columns.name: PointsNumerator
columns.description: Number of points received by user. Field can be null.

columns.name: WeightedDenominator
columns.description: Total number of points possible after weight is applied. Field can be null.

columns.name: WeightedNumerator
columns.description: Number of points received after weight is applied. Field can be null.

columns.name: Modified
columns.description: Date and time the action was made.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User who modified the grade object. Field can be null if done automatically.

Grade Results.name: Grade Results
Grade Results.description: The Grade Results Brightspace Data Set returns data from the newest grade objects first.

columns.name: GradeObjectId
columns.description: Unique grade object identifier

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier

columns.name: PointsNumerator
columns.description: Number of points received by user. Field can be null.

columns.name: PointsDenominator
columns.description: Total number of points possible. Field can be null.

columns.name: WeightedNumerator
columns.description: Number of points received after weight is applied. Field can be null.

columns.name: WeightedDenominator
columns.description: Total number of points possible after weight is applied. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsReleased
columns.description: Is grade released. Field can be null. For example, it is null when the grade object is not submitted.

columns.name: IsDropped
columns.description: Is score dropped from final grade

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Last time score was modified (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: User ID of user who last modified the grade object. Field can be null.

columns.name: Comments
columns.description: Comments. Field can be null.

columns.name: PrivateComments
columns.description: Private comments. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsExempt
columns.description: Is exempt. Field can be null.

columns.name: GradeText
columns.description: Field can be null.

columns.name: GradeReleasedDate
columns.description: Date when the grade was released to the learner (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the grade result. Field can be null.

Grade Scheme Ranges.name: Grade Scheme Ranges
Grade Scheme Ranges.description: The Grade Schemes Ranges Brightspace Data Set describes the ranges used in grade schemes in the organization.

columns.name: GradeSchemeRangeId
columns.description: Unique grade scheme range identifier.

columns.name: GradeSchemeId
columns.description: Unique grade scheme identifier.

columns.name: SymbolString
columns.description: The name of the range.

columns.name: AssignedValue
columns.description: The value assigned to the grade scheme range. Field can be null.

columns.name: RangeStart
columns.description: The starting value (in percent) of the grade scheme.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates that the grade scheme is deleted

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.

Grade Schemes.name: Grade Schemes
Grade Schemes.description: The Grade Schemes Brightspace Data Set returns data about created grade schemes.

columns.name: GradeSchemeId
columns.description: Unique grade scheme identifier.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: SchemeName
columns.description: Grade scheme name

columns.name: GradeSchemeRangeId
columns.description: Unique grade scheme range identifier

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates that the grade scheme is deleted. Field can be null.

columns.name: DeletedDate
columns.description: Date when the scheme was deleted (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.

Gradebook Settings.name: Gradebook Settings
Gradebook Settings.description: The Grade Book Settings Brightspace Data Set returns all the grade book settings for your org units.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: GradeSchemeId
columns.description: Unique grade scheme identifier

columns.name: GradingSystem
columns.description: Type of grading system setup for the course

columns.name: UngradedItems
columns.description: Drop ungraded items/Treat them as 0

columns.name: IsAdjustedFinalGradeReleased
columns.description: Is final adjusted grade released to user. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsCalculatedFinalGradeReleased
columns.description: Is calculated adjusted grade released to user. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date gradebook settings were last modified (UTC). Field can be null.

Intelligent Agent Objects.name: Intelligent Agent Objects
Intelligent Agent Objects.description: The Intelligent Agent Objects Brightspace Data Set describes all the intelligent agents created in your organization.

columns.name: AgentId
columns.description: Unique agent identifier.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier where the agent was created.

columns.name: AgentName
columns.description: Name of intelligent agent.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: The description of the intelligent agent. Field can be null.

columns.name: Enabled
columns.description: Indicates if the agent is enabled.

columns.name: SpecificRoles
columns.description: Array of the roles the agent allies to. If null, it applies to all users visible in the Classlist. Field can be null.

columns.name: LoginConditionEnabled
columns.description: Indicates if the agent looks at login activity.

columns.name: LoginConditionThreshold
columns.description: Number of days the login threshold is set to. Field can be null.

columns.name: LoginConditionType
columns.description: The type of login activity: User has not logged in for at least X days or user has logged in during the past X days. Field can be null.

columns.name: AccessConditionEnabled
columns.description: Indicates if the agent looks at course access activity.

columns.name: AccessConditionThreshold
columns.description: Number of days the course activity threshold is set to. Field can be null.

columns.name: AccessConditionType
columns.description: The type of course activity: User has not accessed course in for at least X days or user has accessed course in during the past X days. Field can be null.

columns.name: ResultId
columns.description: Unique release condition result identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: RepeatType
columns.description: Indicates whether the action is taken once or every time the criteria is met for a user.

columns.name: EmailWhenSatisfied
columns.description: Indicates if an email is sent when the criteria are satisfied.

columns.name: EnableSchedule
columns.description: Indicates if a schedule is used.

columns.name: ScheduleType
columns.description: Defines the frequency the schedule runs on: daily, weekly, monthly, annually. Field can be null.

columns.name: ScheduleRepeatsEvery
columns.description: The number of days, weeks, etc between runs. Field can be null.

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: When the schedule begins (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: When the schedule ends (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: The date when the agent was last modified (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: The unique user identifier of the user who last changed the agent. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if the agent is deleted.

Intelligent Agent Run Log.name: Intelligent Agent Run Log
Intelligent Agent Run Log.description: The Intelligent Agent Run Log Brightspace Data Set lists all the times, including practice runs, each intelligent agent has run in your organization. This data set captures data from November 2020 onwards.

columns.name: AgentId
columns.description: Unique intelligent agent identifier.

columns.name: AgentRunId
columns.description: Unique intelligent agent run identifier.

columns.name: IsPracticeRun
columns.description: Indicates if it is a practice run.

columns.name: IsRunNow
columns.description: Indicates if it was an unscheduled run.

columns.name: NumUsers
columns.description: Count of the number of users affected by this run.

columns.name: NumUsersWithErrors
columns.description: The number of users where the action produced errors.

columns.name: NumUsersWithInfos
columns.description: The number of users where the action produced informational messages.

columns.name: NumUsersWithWarnings
columns.description: The number of users where the action produced warning messages.

columns.name: RunUserId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the user who ran the agent. 0 for system.

columns.name: RunDate
columns.description: The date the run occurred (UTC).

Intelligent Agent Run Users.name: Intelligent Agent Run Users
Intelligent Agent Run Users.description: The Intelligent Agent Run Users Brightspace Data Set lists the users that each intelligent agent run affected and the resulting action. It does not include users that don't meet agent criteria or are part of a practice run.

columns.name: AgentId
columns.description: Unique intelligent agent identifier.

columns.name: AgentRunId
columns.description: Unique intelligent agent run identifier.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier where the agent was run.

columns.name: ActionTypeName
columns.description: The type of action that was taken. Field can be null.

columns.name: ActionHasError
columns.description: Indicates if the intelligent agent run has errors.

columns.name: ActionHasInfo
columns.description: Indicates if the intelligent agent run has info messages.

columns.name: ActionHasWarning
columns.description: Indicates if the intelligent agent run has warnings.

columns.name: ShouldRetry
columns.description: Indicates if the run should be retried.

JIT Provisioned Users Log.name: JIT Provisioned Users Log
JIT Provisioned Users Log.description: The JIT Provisioned Users Log Brightspace Data Set returns information on any issues or failures with the provisioning of users via Just-In-Time User Provisioning. Each row in the data set represents a log of action (for example, created or updated) taken on users provisioned via Just-In-Time User Provisioning. It provides information about the users, the type of their provider, the Id of the provider, date, and time that the users were provisioned (UTC).

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the user.

columns.name: MappingField
columns.description: The Brightspace field used to map the user with the Identity Provider (For example: "Username", "Email Address", "Org Defined Id").

columns.name: MappingFieldValue
columns.description: The value of the Brightspace field used to map the user with the Identity Provider.

columns.name: ProviderType
columns.description: The type of provider that provisioned the user (For example: “SAML”).

columns.name: ProviderId
columns.description: The Id of the provider that provisioned the user.

columns.name: RoleId
columns.description: The Org level Role that the user was provisioned as.

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time that the user was provisioned (UTC).

columns.name: Action
columns.description: Indicates the provisioning action taken on the user (For example:: "Created", "Updated").

LTI Launches.name: LTI Launches
LTI Launches.description: The LTI Launches Brightspace Data Set logs details of each time a user launches an LTI link in the organization.

columns.name: LTILaunchId
columns.description: Unique identifier for each individual launch.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: The user who performed this launch.

columns.name: IMSRoleNames
columns.description: A list of user's IMS roles.

columns.name: ImpersonatingUserId
columns.description: The impersonating user who performed this launch. Field can be null.

columns.name: ImpersonatingUserIMSRoleNames
columns.description: A list of impersonating user's IMS roles. Field can be null.

columns.name: LaunchDate
columns.description: The UTC time when this launch occurred.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Id of the org unit where this launch happened.

columns.name: LTILinkId
columns.description: The id of the link that was used for the LTI launch. Field can be null.

columns.name: DeploymentId
columns.description: The unique identifier of the link's deployment that was used for the LTI launch. This is only available for 1.3 links. Field can be null.

columns.name: ClientId
columns.description: The unique identifier of the link's registration that was used for the LTI launch. This is only available for 1.3 links. Field can be null.

columns.name: ToolProviderId
columns.description: The id of the link's tool provider that was used for the LTI launch. This is only available for 1.1 links. Field can be null.

columns.name: ContentTopicId
columns.description: Id of the content topic where this launch happened. Field can be null.

columns.name: ParentModuleId
columns.description: Id of the parent module where this launch happened. Field can be null.

columns.name: Placement
columns.description: Placement type of this launch. Field can be null.

columns.name: MessageVersion
columns.description: LTI message version of this launch. Field can be null.

columns.name: RequestType
columns.description: LTI request type of this launch. Field can be null.

LTI Link Migration Audit.name: LTI Link Migration Audit
LTI Link Migration Audit.description: The LTI Link Migration Audit Brightspace Data Set logs all attempted LTI link migrations. Each row in the data set represents an attempted link migration from LTI 1.1 (legacy) to LTI 1.3 (advantage).

columns.name: LTIMigrationId
columns.description: Unique identifier for each individual link migration

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: ID of the person who triggered the migration

columns.name: MigrationDate
columns.description: The date the migration occurred for this link (UTC)

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: ID of the org unit where the launch migration occurred

columns.name: LinkId
columns.description: ID of the link that was migrated

columns.name: LinkURL
columns.description: Launch URL for the link

columns.name: LinkName
columns.description: Name of the link

columns.name: ClientId
columns.description: ID of the registration this link was migrated to. Field can be null.

columns.name: RegistrationDomain
columns.description: Domain of the registration this link was migrated to. Field can be null.

columns.name: DeploymentId
columns.description: ID of the link's deployment that was used for the LTI migration. Field can be null.

columns.name: JobId
columns.description: ID for the job this link was migrated under.

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Status result for this link migration. Possible values: 0 = Success 1 = Error 2 = Not Found

columns.name: FailureCode
columns.description: Error code for failed migrations. Possible values: 0 = Registration Not Found 1 = Deployment Not Enabled 2 = Deployment Not Found 3 = Link Not Found 4 = Link Not Legacy 5 = Link URL Invalid 6 = Unknown 7 = Auto Migrate is not enabled in the deployment Field can be null.

columns.name: MigrationType
columns.description: How migration was triggered. Possible values: 0 = Link API 1 = Copy Course 2 = Course Migration Button 3 = Course Migration API

LTI Links.name: LTI Links
LTI Links.description: The LTI Links Brightspace Data Set retrieves the list of LTI links that exist in the organization. It does not include deleted links.

columns.name: LtiLinkId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the LTI link.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Identifier for the Org Unit where the link was created.

columns.name: Title
columns.description: The title of the link.

columns.name: LinkType
columns.description: The type of link, either being a basic LTI launch or a CIM/Deep Linking launch to retrieve content from a tool. (0 = Basic LTI Launch, 1 = Content Item Message or Deeplinking).

columns.name: LTIVersion
columns.description: Indicates whether the link is Legacy or LTI Advantage.

columns.name: Url
columns.description: The URL used during the launch. Field can be null.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Description of the LTI link. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsVisible
columns.description: Determines if the link is displayed when adding to course content in the course. For Legacy LTI, this is called IsVisible in the UI.

columns.name: SendTCInfo
columns.description: If true, determines if the tool_consumer variables are allowed to be included in the LTI launch. Legacy LTI only.

columns.name: SendContextInfo
columns.description: If true, determines if context_id, context_title, context_label, and context_type variables are included in the LTI launch. Legacy LTI only.

columns.name: SendCourseInfo
columns.description: If true, determines if LISSourcedId is included in the launch. Legacy LTI only.

columns.name: SendOrgUnitInfo
columns.description: If true, determines if Org Unit Id, Course Name, Course Code, Org Unit Type, LIS Course Offering Sourcedid, and LIS Course Section Sourcedid are included in the LTI launch. LTIAdvantage only. Field can be null.

columns.name: SendUserId
columns.description: If true, determines a unique identifier for the user, generated on the user's first launch. Legacy LTI only. This is always sent to LTIAdvantage and cannot be turned off unless Anonymous launch is used.

columns.name: SendUserName
columns.description: If true, determines if users first, last, and given name (first last) are sent during launch.

columns.name: SendUserEmail
columns.description: If true, determines if the user's primary email is sent during launch.

columns.name: SendLinkTitle
columns.description: If true, determines if the LTI Link Title is sent during launch. Legacy LTI only.

columns.name: SendLinkDescription
columns.description: If true, determines if the LTI Link Description is sent during launch. Legacy LTI only.

columns.name: SendD2LUserName
columns.description: If true, determines if the Brightspace username is sent during launch.

columns.name: SendD2LOrgDefinedId
columns.description: If true, determines if the Brightspace OrgDefinedId is sent during launch.

columns.name: SendD2LOrgRoleId
columns.description: If true, determines if the custom Brightspace D2L role is sent during launch. Legacy LTI only.

columns.name: SendBrightspaceUserId
columns.description: If true, determines if the D2L User Id is sent during the launch. LTIAdvantage only. Field can be null.

columns.name: Anonymous
columns.description: If true, no user information is sent during the launch. LTIAdvantage only. Field can be null.

columns.name: Shared
columns.description: Indicates whether the link is shared with additional org units or not. Field can be null.

columns.name: UseToolProviderSecuritySettings
columns.description: If true, uses the Tool Provider security settings versus link security settings based on domain matching. Legacy LTI only.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: The last time a link was updated. Field can be null.

columns.name: OuAvailabilitySetId
columns.description: Unique sharing identifier. Can be used to join on LTI Links Shared. Field can be null.

LTI Links Shared.name: LTI Links Shared
LTI Links Shared.description: The LTI Links Shared Brightspace Data Set lists the parent Org Units that a link is shared with and can be used within the organization. LTI Links can be shared explicitly with an org unit or be shared with an org unit’s descendants, which is called inherited sharing. When an LTI 1.1 link is shared, users have the option to share with descendants of a specific type such as course offering. Note: You can be assured of unique rows within the data set by using the following four fields: OuAvailabilitySetId, OrgUnitId, SharingType, and DescendantTypeId. These may be considered a composite unique identifier for the data set.

columns.name: OuAvailabilitySetId
columns.description: Unique sharing identifier. Can be used to join on LTI Links.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Identifier for the Org Unit where the sharing occurred.

columns.name: SharingType
columns.description: Explicit or inherited sharing.

columns.name: DescendantTypeId
columns.description: Identifier of the descendant org unit type. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: The last time a link was updated. Field can be null.

Local Authentication Security Log.name: Local Authentication Security Log
Local Authentication Security Log.description: The Local Authentication Security Log Brightspace Data Set has a record of users who are authorized for local login and whether two-factor authentication was enabled or disabled. This data set only captures data from May 2022 onwards.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the user.

columns.name: Action
columns.description: The action performed for the user. Possible values:

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: UserId of the user who performed the action.

columns.name: ModifiedDate
columns.description: Date and time when the action was performed (UTC).

Organizational Unit Ancestors.name: Organizational Unit Ancestors
Organizational Unit Ancestors.description: The Organizational Unit Ancestors Brightspace Data Set returns a list of all the org units and the corresponding ancestors for an org unit. An ancestor is defined as a parent of an org unit.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: AncestorOrgUnitId
columns.description: Parent org unit identifier

Organizational Unit Descendants.name: Organizational Unit Descendants
Organizational Unit Descendants.description: The Organizational Unit Descendants Brightspace Data Set returns a list of all the org units and the corresponding descendants for an org unit. A descendant is defined as the child of an org unit.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: DescendantOrgUnitId
columns.description: Child org unit identifier

Organizational Unit Parents.name: Organizational Unit Parents
Organizational Unit Parents.description: The Organizational Unit Parents Brightspace Data Set returns the direct parent of each org unit in order to build out the initial org unit structure.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: ParentOrgUnitId
columns.description: Parent org unit identifier

columns.name: RowVersion
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.

columns.name: DateDeleted
columns.description: Date the parent-child relationship was deleted (UTC). Field can be null.

Organizational Unit Recent Access.name: Organizational Unit Recent Access
Organizational Unit Recent Access.description: The Organizational Unit Recent Access Brightspace Data Set returns a list of users, corresponding org units, and the time stamp when they most recently accessed the org unit.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: User Id of the user that accessed the org unit

columns.name: LastAccessedDate
columns.description: Date the org was last accessed (UTC).

Organizational Units.name: Organizational Units
Organizational Units.description: The Organizational Units Brightspace Data Set returns details about all org units within your organization.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: Organization
columns.description: Organization name

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Org unit type. For example: Group, Section, Semester, Department, etc.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Org unit name. Field can be null.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Org unit code. Field can be null.

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: Availability start date (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: Availability end date (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Is the org unit active

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: Org unit create date

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Is the org unit soft deleted or recycled. Soft delete - the org unit has been soft deleted from the application, but is still present in the database. Recycled - the org unit remains in the recycle bin until removed, at which point it is deleted. The OrgName for recycled or soft deleted org units is SYSTEM. Backfill of historical IsDeleted, DeletedDate, and RecycledDate values is determined by the date/time values in the OrgUnit audit log. Field can be null.

columns.name: DeletedDate
columns.description: Date the org unit was soft deleted. Field can be null.

columns.name: RecycledDate
columns.description: Date the org unit was recycled. Field can be null.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the content in the row.

columns.name: OrgUnitTypeId
columns.description: Identifier for the org unit type.

Outcome Details.name: Outcome Details
Outcome Details.description: The Outcome Details Brightspace Data Set provides details of the outcomes that are part of all registries in all your org units. User IDs and dates are only populated for authored outcomes, because updates to ASN outcomes rely on the cache invalidation system (performed by a system user). The only available data for authored outcomes is from June 2021 onwards. All data for ASN imported outcomes is available, starting with your organization's first use of Learning Outcomes.

columns.name: OutcomeId
columns.description: Unique outcome identifier.

columns.name: OutcomeDefinitionSource
columns.description: Provider for this outcome, e.g. ASN.

columns.name: OutcomeDefinitionId
columns.description: ID of outcome within provider (e.g. ASN), or null if locally authored. Field can be null.

columns.name: ParentOutcomeId
columns.description: ID of the parent outcome, if nested under a parent outcome object in the same org unit, or null for top level outcomes with no parent. Field can be null.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Main body of this outcome. Truncated to 1000 characters.

columns.name: Notation
columns.description: Outcome notation for ASN outcomes.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: For authored outcomes, date when this item was initially created (UTC). For imported outcomes, this field is null. Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: For authored outcomes, ID of user who initially created this item. For imported outcomes, this field is null. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if this item has been deleted for authored outcomes. This flag will be null for outcomes imported from external providers, e.g. ASN. Field can be null.

Outcome Registry Owners.name: Outcome Registry Owners
Outcome Registry Owners.description: In the Outcomes Registry Owners Brightspace Data Set, each entry represents a registry for both program and org unit owned registries. The data set only captures data from June 2021 onwards.

columns.name: OwnerType
columns.description: Type of entity which owns this registry. Set to 1 if owner is org unit, set to 2 if owner is program.

columns.name: OwnerId
columns.description: ID or org unit owner when OwnerType is 1. ID of program when OwnerType is 2.

columns.name: RegistryId
columns.description: ID of registry for the org unit or program.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was initially created (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: ID of user who initially created this item. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if this item has been deleted.

Outcomes Aligned to Tool Objects.name: Outcomes Aligned to Tool Objects
Outcomes Aligned to Tool Objects.description: The Outcomes Aligned to Tool Objects Brightspace Data Set provides details of which outcomes are aligned to which assessment tools for all your org units. It includes a row for every outcome aligned to an assessment activity, for both direct alignments and alignments references via rubrics. The data set only captures data from June 2021 onwards.

columns.name: ObjectType
columns.description: Type of tool this outcome is aligned to. See Tool-Specific Object Lookup for details.

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: ID of the tool this outcome is aligned to. See Tool-Specific Object Lookup for details.

columns.name: OutcomeId
columns.description: ID of this Outcome in the Outcome Details data set.

columns.name: RegistryId
columns.description: ID of registry representing the context in which this alignment exists.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was initially created (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: ID of user who initially created this item. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if this item has been deleted.

Outcomes Assessed Checkpoints.name: Outcomes Assessed Checkpoints
Outcomes Assessed Checkpoints.description: The Outcomes Assessed Checkpoints Brightspace Data Set provides details about the Overall Achievement Calculation Settings for a checkpoint. The data set only captures data from July 2021 onwards.

columns.name: CheckpointId
columns.description: ID of this checkpoint.

columns.name: DemonstrationId
columns.description: ID of demonstration which assesses this outcome against the checkpoint.

columns.name: Feedback
columns.description: Feedback left by assessor, truncated to 1000 characters.

columns.name: ConfigDecayRate
columns.description: Value of the decay rate in Mastery View Settings for checkpoint calculation.

columns.name: ConfigAggregationMethod

columns.name: ConfigTieBreaker

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
