columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if this item has been deleted.

Outcomes Course Specific Scales.name: Outcomes Course Specific Scales
Outcomes Course Specific Scales.description: The Outcomes Course Specific Scales Brightspace Data Set provides details on which achievement scales and achievement thresholds are being used in each of your courses. The only available data for course specific achievement scales is from May 2023 onwards.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: ID of the org unit this registry is associated with.

columns.name: RegistryId
columns.description: ID of the current registry.

columns.name: ScaleId
columns.description: ID of the scale set as the LOA for the current registry.

columns.name: AchievementThreshold
columns.description: Level ID representing the threshold of achievement for this registry. Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was originally created (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified. Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Whether this item has been deleted.

Outcomes Demonstrations.name: Outcomes Demonstrations
Outcomes Demonstrations.description: In the Outcomes Demonstrations Brightspace Data Set, each entry represents an evaluation of an assessment activity that is aligned to a learning outcome. For most tool object types, assessments are only visible in this data set when they are made visible to learners. The data set only captures data from June 2021 onwards.

columns.name: DemonstrationId
columns.description: ID of this demonstration.

columns.name: ExplicitlyEnteredScaleLevelId
columns.description: Result of this evaluation if manually entered by assessor. Field can be null if achieved level has not been manually overridden.

columns.name: AutomaticallyGeneratedScaleLevelId
columns.description: Result of this evaluation if automatically generated by LMS. Field can be null.

columns.name: AlignedObjectType
columns.description: Type of assessed tool for this demonstration. See Tool-Specific Object Lookup for details.

columns.name: AlignedObjectId
columns.description: ID of assessed tool for this demonstration. See Tool-Specific Object Lookup for details.

columns.name: OutcomeId
columns.description: ID of assessed outcome.

columns.name: RegistryId
columns.description: ID of registry representing the context in which the demonstration was made.

columns.name: IsPublished
columns.description: Indicates if this demonstration has been made available to the assessed learner. Field can be null.

columns.name: AssessedUserId
columns.description: ID of the user who made the submission.

columns.name: AssessedDate
columns.description: Date of initial assessment (UTC).

columns.name: AssessorUserId
columns.description: ID of the user who initially evaluated the submission. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if this item has been deleted.

Outcomes In Registries.name: Outcomes In Registries
Outcomes In Registries.description: The Outcomes in Registries Brightspace Data Set provides details of which outcomes belong to which registries for all your org units. It can be used to list all outcomes in the intent list of a course, or all the outcomes in a program. The only available data for org unit owned registries is from June 2021 onwards. All data for program registries is available, starting with your organization's first use of Learning Outcomes.

columns.name: OutcomeId
columns.description: ID of this Outcome in the Outcome Details data set.

columns.name: RegistryId
columns.description: ID of registry representing the context in which this outcome exists.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: For imported outcomes, the date that this outcome was mapped to the registry (UTC). For authored outcomes, the date this outcome was created. Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: ID of user who imported or created the outcome in the registry. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if this item has been deleted.

Outcomes Program Details.name: Outcomes Program Details
Outcomes Program Details.description: The Outcomes Program Details Brightspace Data Set provides details about the programs that are defined to hold a collection of outcomes (registry). All data for the data set is available, starting with your organization's first use of Learning Outcomes.

columns.name: ProgramId
columns.description: ID of this program which owns the registry.

columns.name: ProgramName
columns.description: The name of this program.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: ID of the org unit which owns this program.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was initially created (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: ID of user who initially created this item. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if this item has been deleted.

Outcomes Rubric Alignments.name: Outcomes Rubric Alignments
Outcomes Rubric Alignments.description: In the Outcomes Rubric Alignments Brightspace Data Set, each entry represents an alignment for a learning outcome to a rubric criterion row. The data set only captures data from June 2021 onwards.

columns.name: RubricId
columns.description: Unique rubric identifier.

columns.name: CriterionId
columns.description: Identifier for the criterion row of the rubric.

columns.name: OutcomeId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the outcome object.

columns.name: RegistryId
columns.description: ID of the registry for the org unit or program.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: The date when the alignment of this outcome was recorded for this rubric criterion row. Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: ID of the user who initially created this alignment. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Set to true if the outcome alignment has been removed from the rubric or the rubric has been deleted.

Outcomes Scale Definition.name: Outcomes Scale Definition
Outcomes Scale Definition.description: In the Outcomes Scale Definition Brightspace Data Set, each entry represents an achievement scale defined at the organization level. All data for the data set is available, starting with your organization's first use of Learning Outcomes.

columns.name: ScaleId
columns.description: ID for this scale.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Name of this scale.

columns.name: IsDefault
columns.description: Indicates if this is the scale used by default whenever an assessment of an outcome takes place.

columns.name: UsePercentages
columns.description: Indicates if percentage ranges are specified for each scale level. This is used when suggesting a scale level for an assessment. Specific percentage threshold values are associated with each Scale Level.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was initially created (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: ID of user who initially created this item. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if this item has been deleted.

columns.name: RegistryId
columns.description: ID of registry that owns this scale.

Outcomes Scale Level Definition.name: Outcomes Scale Level Definition
Outcomes Scale Level Definition.description: In the Outcomes Scale Level Definition Brightspace Data Set, each entry represents a scale level defined in your scales. On the evaluation UI, they are represented by a single, clickable "frame". Examples include "Not Yet Achieved", "Achieved", and "Mastered". Scale levels can't be deleted once created. Scale levels become inaccessible when their parent scale is deleted. All data for the data set is available, starting with your organization's first use of Learning Outcomes.

columns.name: ScaleLevelId
columns.description: ID for this scale level.

columns.name: ScaleId
columns.description: ID of the parent scale.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Name of this scale level.

columns.name: SortOrder
columns.description: Determines ordering for this scale level.

columns.name: PercentageRangeStart
columns.description: The score percentage threshold boundary for this scale level. This value is used when automatically suggesting a scale level from numeric assessment results. Field can be null.

columns.name: RGB
columns.description: Color of this scale level in HTML hex notation.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was initially created (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: ID of user who initially created this item. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item.

Portfolio Categories.name: Portfolio Categories
Portfolio Categories.description: The Portfolio Categories Brightspace Data Set details the categories that have been created in your organization.

columns.name: CategoryId
columns.description: Unique category identifier

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier. Field can be null

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Portfolio category name.

columns.name: IsRetired
columns.description: Indicates the category is retired and therefore cannot be used.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if the portfolio category is deleted

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the portfolio category was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: User who last modified the portfolio category.

Portfolio Evidence Categories.name: Portfolio Evidence Categories
Portfolio Evidence Categories.description: The Portfolio Evidence Categories Brightspace Data Set details the one or many categories that are mapped to each piece of evidence in the Portfolios in your organization.

columns.name: CategoryId
columns.description: The identifier for the category

columns.name: EvidenceId
columns.description: The identifier for the evidence

columns.name: Group
columns.description: Indicates how the category was linked to the evidence. By the learner or instructor.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates whether the link between the category and the evidence is deleted

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the portfolio category was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: User who last modified the portfolio category

Portfolio Evidence Log.name: Portfolio Evidence Log
Portfolio Evidence Log.description: The Portfolio Evidence Log Brightspace Data Set returns the actions that occur to each piece of evidence in the Portfolios in your organization. The first data point is from May, 2019 or your first use of the Portfolio tool, whichever is more recent.

columns.name: LogId
columns.description: Unique identifier for each action that occurs on each object in a portfolio.

columns.name: ParentObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the evidence. Field can be null.

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the object where the action occurred. This is equal to ParentObjectId when the ObjectType is evidence.

columns.name: ObjectType
columns.description: Indicates what type of object the action occurred on such as the evidence itself or reflection, etc.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: Action
columns.description: The action that occurred: Created, Updated or Deleted.

columns.name: IsMobile
columns.description: Indicates if the action occurred on a mobile device.

columns.name: ActionDate
columns.description: Date action was completed (UTC).

Portfolio Evidence Objects.name: Portfolio Evidence Objects
Portfolio Evidence Objects.description: The Portfolio Evidence Objects Brightspace Data Set defines the attributes of each piece of evidence in Portfolios in your organization.

columns.name: EvidenceId
columns.description: Unique evidence identifier

columns.name: OwnerId
columns.description: The user ID that this evidence belongs to

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: EvidenceType
columns.description: The type of evidence

columns.name: Title
columns.description: The evidence title

columns.name: IsApproved
columns.description: Indicates the evidence is approved

columns.name: IsSpotlighted
columns.description: Indicates the evidence is spotlighted

columns.name: IsSharedToParents
columns.description: Indicates the evidence is shared to parents

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates that the evidence object is deleted.

columns.name: IsRecoverableByInstructor
columns.description: Indicates that the deleted evidence object can be recovered by the instructor. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the evidence object was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: User who last modified the evidence object

columns.name: IsSharedWithInstructor
columns.description: Indicates the evidence is shared to instructors. Field can be null.

columns.name: DateSharedWithInstructor
columns.description: Date when the evidence was most recently shared to instructors (UTC). Field can be null.

PreRequisite Conditions Met.name: PreRequisite Conditions Met
PreRequisite Conditions Met.description: The PreRequisite Conditions Met Brightspace Data Set returns all the prerequisite conditions that have been met for applicable users in the organization.

columns.name: PreRequisiteId
columns.description: Unique prerequisite identifier.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier.

columns.name: DateMet
columns.description: Date the prerequisite condition was met (UTC). Field can be null

Question Library.name: Question Library
Question Library.description: The Question Library Brightspace Data Set details all the questions that have been created in the organization. This includes quiz questions that are not currently used in a quiz.

columns.name: QuestionId
columns.description: Unique question identifier

columns.name: QuestionVersionId
columns.description: Unique question version identifier. Each time you edit a quiz, survey, or self-assessment question, a new version of that question is created, indicated by the QuestionVersionID field.

columns.name: IsAutoGraded
columns.description: Indicates if the question is automatically graded.

columns.name: TemplateTypeId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the template used to create this question. Field can be null.

columns.name: QuestionType
columns.description: Type of question. Field can be null.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Question name. Field can be null.

columns.name: Question
columns.description: Body of the question. Field can be null.

columns.name: Comment
columns.description: Comment associated with the question. Field can be null. When you add a question to a quiz, the Overall Question Feedback field provides feedback comments during the grading process. The information captured in this field is the Comment field.

columns.name: AnswerKey
columns.description: Answer key for the question. This only applies to Written Response Questions. Field can be null.

columns.name: CreationDate
columns.description: Date the question was created (UTC)

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.

columns.name: AllowsAttachments
columns.description: Indicates if attachments are allowed in this question. Field can be null.

Question Relationships.name: Question Relationships
Question Relationships.description: The Question Relationships Brightspace Data Set details which quizzes, sections, question pools, surveys, or self-assessments the questions in Question Library have been added to.

columns.name: CollectionId
columns.description: Unique question collection identifier

columns.name: QuestionId
columns.description: Unique question identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: QuestionVersionId
columns.description: Unique question version identifier. Each time you edit a quiz, survey, or self-assessment question, a new version of that question is created, indicated by the QuestionVersionID field. Field can be null.

columns.name: Order
columns.description: Order in which questions appear in the user interface. If the question is within a section, the Order field uses the section's order in the user interface.

columns.name: SectionId
columns.description: Unique section identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsQuestionPool
columns.description: Indicates if the question pool is a random section.

columns.name: CreationDate
columns.description: Date the question was created (UTC)

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Id of the user who created the quiz, section, question pool, survey, or self-assessment. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the quiz, section, question pool, survey, or self-assessment was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: Id of the user who last modified the quiz, section, question pool, survey, or self-assessment. Field can be null.

columns.name: Points
columns.description: Possible points for the question. Field can be null.

columns.name: Difficulty
columns.description: Difficulty level assigned to the question. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsBonus
columns.description: Indicates if the question is a bonus question. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsMandatory
columns.description: Indicates if the question is mandatory. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if the question is deleted.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the question. This column supports the Question Pools information in the Assessment Quality Dashboard. Field can be null.

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the question.

Quiz Attempts.name: Quiz Attempts
Quiz Attempts.description: The Quiz Attempts Brightspace Data Set returns details for each user quiz attempt for all your org units. This data set includes completed quiz attempts and in-progress quiz attempts. Note: As of the July 2023/20.23.7 release, the Grace Period and Allow the student to continue working, but automatically score the attempt as zero timing options are no longer available within the Quizzes tool. This affects the data within this data set in the following ways:

columns.name: AttemptId
columns.description: Unique attempt identifier

columns.name: QuizId
columns.description: Unique quiz identifier

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: AttemptNumber
columns.description: Attempt number for the quiz

columns.name: TimeStarted
columns.description: Quiz attempt start time (UTC).

columns.name: TimeCompleted
columns.description: Quiz attempt completion time (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: Score
columns.description: Score for the attempt. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsGraded
columns.description: If a quiz has been graded

columns.name: OldAttemptNumber
columns.description: Number of previous times a learner has attempted the quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates that the quiz attempt is deleted. Field can be null.

columns.name: PossibleScore
columns.description: Indicates the total possible value of the quiz attempt. This should indicate what the quiz "out of" score is, even if the quiz total possible value changes after the attempt is made. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsRetakeIncorrectOnly
columns.description: Indicates if this attempt only includes questions that were incorrect on a previous attempt.

columns.name: DueDate
columns.description: Quiz attempt due date (UTC). Based on when the learner begins the attempt, even if the instructor changes the quiz due date later. Field can be null.

columns.name: TimeLimit
columns.description: Amount of time, in minutes, that a learner has to complete the quiz attempt. Based on when the learner begins the attempt, even if the instructor changes the quiz time limit later. Field can be null.

columns.name: TimeLimitEnforced
columns.description: Indicates whether the time limit on this quiz attempt is enforced. Based on when the learner begins the attempt, even if the instructor changes the time limit enforced setting later. Field can be null.

columns.name: GracePeriod
columns.description: Amount of time, in minutes, that a learner has to complete the quiz attempt in addition to the time limit. Based on when the learner begins the attempt, even if the instructor changes the quiz grace period later. Field can be null.

columns.name: GracePeriodExceededBehaviour
columns.description: If the time limit is enforced for this attempt, indicates the desired behavior when the grace period is exceeded. Based on when the learner begins the attempt, even if the instructor changes the exceeded grace period behavior setting later. Types can be: Field can be null.

columns.name: ExtendedDeadline
columns.description: The extended deadline learners are allowed beyond the grace period for this attempt, in minutes. Based on when the learner begins the attempt, even if the instructor changes the quiz's extended deadline later. Beyond this extended deadline, the learner's attempt is graded as 0. Field can be null.

Quiz Attempts Log.name: Quiz Attempts Log
Quiz Attempts Log.description: The Quiz Attempts Log Brightspace Data Set returns details on the events that occur during a quiz attempt. This data set includes completed quiz attempts and in-progress quiz attempts. There is no explicit time cap placed on this data set.  However, data is sorted from newest to oldest and older data will be dropped if the data set reaches the row limit.

columns.name: LogId
columns.description: Unique log identifier

columns.name: AttemptId
columns.description: Unique attempt identifier

columns.name: EventTypeId
columns.description: Unique event type identifier

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Name of the event. Field can be null.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Description of the event. Field can be null.

columns.name: EventTime
columns.description: Event occurred time (UTC).

columns.name: IPAddress
columns.description: IPAddress at which the event occurred. Field can be null.

Quiz Objects.name: Quiz Objects
Quiz Objects.description: The Quiz Objects Brightspace Data Set returns information about the settings and properties of a quiz. Note: As the July 2023/20.23.7 release, the Grace Period and Allow the student to continue working, but automatically score the attempt as zero timing options are no longer available within the Quizzes tool. This affects the data within this data set in the following ways:

columns.name: QuizId
columns.description: Unique quiz identifier

columns.name: QuizName
columns.description: Quiz name

columns.name: QuizDescription
columns.description: Description of the Quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: QuizCategory
columns.description: Category assigned to the quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicates if the quiz is active

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Org unit identifier associated with the quiz object

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: First time the quiz is visible. Field can be null.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: Last date the quiz is visible. Field can be null.

columns.name: DueDate
columns.description: Date the quiz is due (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: CreationDate
columns.description: Date the quiz was created (UTC).

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Id of the user who created the quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the quiz was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: Id of the user who last modified the quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: GradeObjectId
columns.description: Grade object identifier associated with the quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: OverallScoreCalculation
columns.description: Quiz score calculation method. Types include: Highest Attempt, Lowest Attempt, Average of all attempts, First Attempt, and Last Attempt. Field can be null.

columns.name: QuizScoreDenominator
columns.description: Denominator for the quiz score

columns.name: HasPassword
columns.description: Is a password required to access this quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: IPRestricted
columns.description: Is this quiz available to only certain IP Addresses. Field can be null.

columns.name: TimeLimit
columns.description: Does this quiz have a time limit.

columns.name: TimeLimitEnforced
columns.description: Is the time limit assigned to this quiz enforced.

columns.name: TimeLimitExceededBehavior
columns.description: Are learners taking this quiz permitted to exceed the time limit. Possible values: Field can be null.

columns.name: TimeLimitGracePeriod
columns.description: Is there a grace period at the end of the time limit on this quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: AttemptsAllowed
columns.description: Number of times learners are permitted to attempt the quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: PreventMovingBackwards
columns.description: Indicates if learners are permitted to move to previous pages in the quiz.

columns.name: AllowHints
columns.description: Indicates that there are hints allowed for the quiz.

columns.name: NotificationEmail
columns.description: Indicates that there is a notification email for this quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: DisablePagerAccess
columns.description: Indicates that learners cannot access the pager functionality

columns.name: DisplayInCalendar
columns.description: The quiz is not turned on in the calendar. Field can be null.

columns.name: ShowClock
columns.description: Indicates whether there is a quiz clock visible while learners are taking the quiz.

columns.name: IsAttemptRldb
columns.description: Indicates that a quiz was attempted using Respondus.

columns.name: IsSubviewRldb
columns.description: Indicates that a portion of the quiz was attempted using Respondus

columns.name: SortOrder
columns.description: Display sort order used for the content objects

columns.name: CategoryId
columns.description: Unique category identifier for the quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: ResultId
columns.description: Unique release condition result identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsRetakeIncorrectOnly
columns.description: Indicates if the quiz allows Retake Incorrect Only.

columns.name: PagingTypeId
columns.description: Exposes page break information from the New Quiz Experience. Possible values: Field can be null.

Quiz Question Answer Options.name: Quiz Question Answer Options
Quiz Question Answer Options.description: The Quiz Question Answer Options Brightspace Data Set returns possible options for a given quiz answer. Only includes answer options for these question types: Short Answer, Fill in the Blanks, and Multi-Short Answer. Rows in the data set are filtered out if they are associated with deleted quiz attempts.

columns.name: AnswerId
columns.description: Unique answer Identifier

columns.name: AnswerText
columns.description: User answer. Field can be null.

columns.name: Weight
columns.description: Weight associated with the answer

columns.name: QuestionId
columns.description: Unique question identifier

columns.name: QuestionVersionId
columns.description: Unique question version identifier

columns.name: QuizObjectId
columns.description: Unique quiz object identifier

columns.name: AnswerOptionId
columns.description: Unique answer option identifier

Quiz Question Answers.name: Quiz Question Answers
Quiz Question Answers.description: The Quiz Question Answers Brightspace Data Set returns possible answers for a given quiz question. Rows in the data set are filtered out if they are associated with deleted quiz attempts.

columns.name: AnswerId
columns.description: Unique answer identifier

columns.name: QuestionId
columns.description: Unique question identifier

columns.name: QuestionVersionId
columns.description: Unique question version identifier

columns.name: SortOrder
columns.description: Order in which the quiz answers are displayed or correct answer order for ordering questions.

columns.name: IsCorrect
columns.description: Is answer correct. Field can be null.

columns.name: Weight
columns.description: Weight associated with answer. Field can be null.

columns.name: Answer
columns.description: Answer text. Field can be null.

columns.name: Comment
columns.description: Instructor comment on the answer. Field can be null.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: System description for the type of answer expected.

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the answer

Quiz Survey Sections.name: Quiz Survey Sections
Quiz Survey Sections.description: The Quiz Survey Sections Brightspace Data Set returns information about all the sections and question pools that have been created in quizzes in the organization.

columns.name: CollectionId
columns.description: Unique question collection identifier

columns.name: SectionId
columns.description: Unique section identifier.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Field can be null.

columns.name: NameIsDisplayed
columns.description: Indicates if the section name is hidden or shown.

columns.name: IsQuestionPool
columns.description: Indicates if the question pool is a random section.

columns.name: SectionText
columns.description: Field can be null.

columns.name: SectionTextIsHTML
columns.description: Indicates if the section text is HTML or plain text.

columns.name: IsSectionTextHidden
columns.description: Indicates if the section text is hidden or shown. Values are 0 for hidden, and 1 for shown. Field can be null.

columns.name: QuestionPoints
columns.description: Field can be null.

columns.name: NumQuestions
columns.description: Indicates the number of questions in the quiz section.

columns.name: NumChoices
columns.description: Indicates the number of choices in the question pool from which the quiz can be created.

columns.name: Shuffle
columns.description: Indicates that the quiz questions in the pool are shuffled.

columns.name: CreationDate
columns.description: Date the quiz was created (UTC).

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Id of the user who created the quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the quiz was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: Id of the user who last modified the quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates that the quiz question is deleted. Field can be null.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the question. This column supports the Question Pools information in the Assessment Quality Dashboard. Field can be null.

Quiz User Answer Responses.name: Quiz User Answer Responses
Quiz User Answer Responses.description: The Quiz User Answer Responses Brightspace Data Set returns details on how a user answered a specific quiz question. Data includes whether an answer is correct and details around the quiz score. Rows in the data set are filtered out if they are associated with deleted quiz questions. The Quiz User Answer Responses data set and differential is limited to 3 years of data (all of the previous two calendar years and the current calendar year to date).

columns.name: AttemptId
columns.description: Unique attempt identifier

columns.name: AttemptNumber
columns.description: Attempt number associated with the AttemptId

columns.name: QuestionId
columns.description: Unique question identifier

columns.name: QuestionVersionId
columns.description: Unique question version identifier

columns.name: AnswerId
columns.description: Unique answer identifier

columns.name: SortOrder
columns.description: Order in which quiz question options appear to the user. For example, the order in which multi-select or true /false options appear. Some question types can be randomized, for example, multi-select.

columns.name: IsCorrect
columns.description: Is user response correct. Field can be null.

columns.name: UserSelection
columns.description: Option the user chose for the question. Field can be null.

columns.name: UserAnswer
columns.description: User answer. Field can be null.

columns.name: FileSetId
columns.description: Indicates the auto generated file set ID of uploaded file(s). Field can be null.

Quiz User Answers.name: Quiz User Answers
Quiz User Answers.description: The Quiz User Answers Brightspace Data Set returns data to describe the option a user chose or the answer a user provided for a question. Rows in the data set are filtered out if they are associated with deleted quiz questions. The Quiz User Answers data set is limited to 3 years of data (all of the previous two calendar years and the current calendar year to date).

columns.name: AttemptId
columns.description: Unique attempt identifier

columns.name: QuestionId
columns.description: Unique question identifier.

columns.name: QuestionVersionId
columns.description: Unique question version identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: TimeCompleted
columns.description: Date/time a section or question pool (random section) was completed (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: QuestionNumber
columns.description: Question number in the quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: Comment
columns.description: Feedback left by instructor. Field can be null.

columns.name: SortOrder
columns.description: Order in which quiz questions appear in the user interface. This also accounts for the ordering of sections (question numbers are null for sections).

columns.name: Score
columns.description: Score the user received for the answer. Field can be null.

columns.name: Page
columns.description: Page the question appeared on when the user took the quiz

columns.name: SectionId
columns.description: Unique section identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: Unique global identifier of the question object.

Release Condition Objects.name: Release Condition Objects
Release Condition Objects.description: The Release Condition Objects Brightspace Data Set returns all the release conditions (pre-requisites and results) that have been created in the organization.

columns.name: PreRequisiteId
columns.description: Unique pre-requisite identifier.

columns.name: ResultId
columns.description: Unique result identifier.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique organization identifier.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Pre-requisite condition name.

columns.name: IsNegativeCondition
columns.description: Indicates if the condition relies on something not happening.

columns.name: PreRequisiteToolId
columns.description: Unique pre-requisite tool identifier.

columns.name: Id1
columns.description: Unique identifier for the pre-requisite tool. Field can be null.

columns.name: Id2
columns.description: Secondary unique identifier for the pre-requisite tool when needed. Field can be null.

columns.name: ResultToolId
columns.description: Unique result tool identifier.

columns.name: UsesPercentage
columns.description: Indicates if the pre-requisite is looking at a grade percentage.

columns.name: OperatorTypeDesc
columns.description: Defines where all or any of the pre-requisites need to be met. Field can be null.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.

Release Condition Results.name: Release Condition Results
Release Condition Results.description: The Release Condition Results Brightspace Data Set returns all the release condition results and whether they have been met for applicable users in the organization. These are the resulting actions that occur when pre-requisites are met.

columns.name: ResultId
columns.description: Unique result identifier.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier.

columns.name: Met
columns.description: Indicates whether the result has been met or not met by the user.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.

Role Details.name: Role Details
Role Details.description: The Role Details Brightspace Data Set returns a full set of attributes for each role in your organization.

columns.name: RoleId
columns.description: Unique role identifier.

columns.name: OrgId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: RoleName
columns.description: Name of the role.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Description of the role. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsCascading
columns.description: Attribute indicating that the role cascades from other roles.

columns.name: InClassList
columns.description: Attribute indicating that users with this role appear in class lists.

columns.name: ClassListRoleName
columns.description: Attribute indicating the role name for users that appear in class lists. Field can be null.

columns.name: ClassListShowGroups
columns.description: Attribute indicating that members of this role can see groups consisting of learners in the class list.

columns.name: ClassListShowSections
columns.description: Attribute indicating that members of this role can see sections consisting of learners in the class list.

columns.name: ClassListDisplayRole
columns.description: Attribute indicating that members of this role appear in the class list with the role displayed.

columns.name: AccessInactiveCO
columns.description: Attribute indicating that the role can access inactive course offerings.

columns.name: HasSpecialAccess
columns.description: Attribute indicating that the role has special access to courses.

columns.name: AddToCourseOfferingGroups
columns.description: Attribute indicating that the role appears in the course offering group.

columns.name: CanBeAutoEnrolledIntoGroups
columns.description: Attribute indicating that the role can be automatically enrolled into groups in a class.

columns.name: AddToCourseOfferingSections
columns.description: Attribute indicating that users with this role can be added to course offering sections.

columns.name: CanBeAutoEnrolledIntoSections
columns.description: Attribute indicating that users with this role can be automatically enrolled into course sections.

columns.name: ClassListDisplayRoleCategory
columns.description: Attributing that this role category appears in class lists.

columns.name: ClassListRoleCategory
columns.description: Attribute indicating this is a role that can be used to sort members of a class list.

columns.name: ClassListRoleCategoryOrder
columns.description: Attribute indicating the order in which the role categories should appear in the class list.

columns.name: AccessPastCourses
columns.description: Attribute indicating that this role can access past courses.

columns.name: AccessFutureCourses
columns.description: Attribute indicating that this role can access courses that have not yet started.

columns.name: SortOrder
columns.description: Indicates the sort order for users with this role.

columns.name: ShowInContent
columns.description: Indicates that this role should appear in Content.

columns.name: ShowInDiscussionAssess
columns.description: Indicates that this role should appear in Discussions assessments.

columns.name: ShowInDiscussionStats
columns.description: Indicates that this role should appear in Discussions statistics.

columns.name: ShowInGrades
columns.description: Indicates that this role should appear in Grades.

columns.name: ShowInAttendance
columns.description: Indicates that this role should appear in Attendance.

columns.name: AllowSelfEnrollInGroups
columns.description: Indicates that this role should have permission to self-enroll in groups.

columns.name: ShowInRegistration
columns.description: Indicates that this role should appear in registration information for a course.

columns.name: ShowInUserProgress
columns.description: Indicates that this role should appear in User Progress.

columns.name: RoleAlias
columns.description: Indicates the alias for this role. Field can be null.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version for this row entry.

columns.name: RoleCode
columns.description: Code assigned to each role for mapping to other systems or organizations. Field can be null.

Rubric Assessment.name: Rubric Assessment
Rubric Assessment.description: The Rubric Assessment Brightspace Data Set returns rubric outcomes that are associated with a competency. Includes incomplete rubric assessments, which have a null LevelAchieved value.

columns.name: RubricId
columns.description: Unique rubric identifier

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier

columns.name: Score
columns.description: Rubric score. Field can be null.

columns.name: AssessedByUserId
columns.description: Rubric assessed by. Field can be null.

columns.name: AssessmentDate
columns.description: Date the rubric was assessed (UTC).

columns.name: IsCompleted
columns.description: Is rubric assessment complete.

columns.name: ActivityType
columns.description: Activity type associated with the rubric. Field can be null.

columns.name: ActivityObjectId
columns.description: Identifier of the activity associated with the rubric. Field can be null.

columns.name: DateCreated
columns.description: Date rubric was created (UTC).

columns.name: AssessmentId
columns.description: Unique assessment ID.

columns.name: LevelAchievedId
columns.description: Unique rubric level achieved identifier. Field can be null.

Rubric Assessment Criteria.name: Rubric Assessment Criteria
Rubric Assessment Criteria.description: The Rubric Assessment Criteria Brightspace Data Set returns details for all rubric criteria in rubrics.

columns.name: AssessmentId
columns.description: Unique assessment ID

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier

columns.name: RubricId
columns.description: Unique rubric ID

columns.name: Score
columns.description: Rubric score the user achieved on a criterion. Field can be null.

columns.name: Feedback
columns.description: Feedback for that criterion. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsScoreOverridden
columns.description: Is score overridden by instructor

columns.name: CriterionId
columns.description: Unique criterion identifier

columns.name: LevelAchievedId
columns.description: Unique rubric level achieved identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.

Rubric Criteria Levels.name: Rubric Criteria Levels
Rubric Criteria Levels.description: The Rubric Criteria Levels Brightspace Data Set returns the details for all rubric criteria and associated levels where they exist.

columns.name: RubricId
columns.description: Unique rubric identifier

columns.name: CriterionId
columns.description: Identifier for the criterion associated with the rubric levels

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Description of the criterion. Field can be null.

columns.name: Feedback
columns.description: Automated feedback provided by the rubric for the rubric criterion. Field can be null.

columns.name: Value
columns.description: Value assigned to the criterion in the rubric. This is populated based on the rubric type and the scoring method. Field can be null

columns.name: LevelId
columns.description: Identifier of the level associated with the criterion

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Set to true if the criterion has been deleted

Rubric Object Criteria.name: Rubric Object Criteria
Rubric Object Criteria.description: The Rubric Object Criteria Brightspace Data Set returns information about the rubric criteria within a rubric.

columns.name: RubricId
columns.description: Unique rubric identifier

columns.name: CriterionId
columns.description: Identifier for the criterion associated with the rubric levels

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Name of the criterion.

columns.name: SortOrder
columns.description: Sort order by which the criteria is listed

columns.name: CriteriaGroupId
columns.description: Identifier for the criterion group to which the criterion belongs

columns.name: GroupName
columns.description: Name of the criterion group.

columns.name: GroupSortOrder
columns.description: Sort order assigned to the criterion group

columns.name: LevelSetId
columns.description: Identifier of the Level Set to which the level belongs

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Set to true if the Level Set, Criterion Group or Criterion has been deleted

Rubric Object Levels.name: Rubric Object Levels
Rubric Object Levels.description: The Rubric Object Levels Brightspace Data Set returns information about the rubric levels in a rubric criteria.

columns.name: RubricId
columns.description: Unique rubric Identifier

columns.name: LevelId
columns.description: Identifier for the level associated with the rubric

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Name of the level

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Description of the level. Field can be null.

columns.name: Feedback
columns.description: Automated feedback provided by the rubric for the corresponding level. Field can be null.

columns.name: Value
columns.description: Value assigned to the level. This is populated based on the rubric type and scoring method. Field can be null.

columns.name: RangeStartValue
columns.description: Level range start value which is populated based on the rubric type and scoring method. Field can be null.

columns.name: SortOrder
columns.description: Sort order for the levels

columns.name: LevelSetId
columns.description: Identifier for the level set to which the level belongs

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Set to true when Level Set or Level have been deleted. Field can be null.

Rubric Objects.name: Rubric Objects
Rubric Objects.description: The Rubric Objects Brightspace Data Set returns information about the rubric properties.

columns.name: RubricId
columns.description: Unique rubric Identifier

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Name of the rubric

columns.name: RubricStatus
columns.description: Status of the rubric. Field can be null.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Description of the rubric object. Field can be null.

columns.name: RubricType
columns.description: Type of rubric used. Field can be null.

columns.name: ScoringMethods
columns.description: Type of scoring methods used. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsScoreVisible
columns.description: Is the rubric score visible

columns.name: OrgUnitID
columns.description: Org unit identifier associated with the rubric

columns.name: IsShared
columns.description: Set to true if the Rubric object is shared

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Set to true if the rubric object is deleted

Rubrics Edit.name: Rubrics Edit
Rubrics Edit.description: In the Rubrics Edit Brightspace Data Set, each row represents one element of a rubric that was changed by a permissioned user. If multiple elements are changed in the same rubric, multiple data rows will appear in the data set. Modified Object Type Lookup The following table contains all possible ModifiedObjectType values and their corresponding rubric element:

columns.name: AuditLogId
columns.description: Unique identifier

columns.name: RubricId
columns.description: Unique rubric identifier

columns.name: CriterionId
columns.description: Identifier for the criterion row of the rubric. Field can be null.

columns.name: LevelId
columns.description: Identifier for the evaluation level of the rubric. Field can be null.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of the user who last modified this item

columns.name: ModifiedObjectType
columns.description: Rubric element that has been edited. Refer to Modified Object Type Lookup for details.

columns.name: CriteriaGroupId
columns.description: Identifier for the criterion group to which the criterion belongs. Field can be null.

columns.name: ModifiedDate
columns.description: The date when this item was modified (UTC)

columns.name: PreviousValue
columns.description: The value of the object prior to the modification.

columns.name: ModifiedValue
columns.description: The value of the object after the modification.

columns.name: IsLocked
columns.description: The locked status of the rubric at the time of the modification

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Incrementing sequence number to keep track of edits that were made during the same session.

SCORM Activities.name: SCORM Activities
SCORM Activities.description: The SCORM Activities Brightspace Data Set describes the activities that exist in the SCORM package. Each activity will only be known after the first user, regardless of role, attempts it.

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the SCORM activity.

columns.name: ScormObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier for each content object.

columns.name: ParentActivityId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the parent activity. Field can be null.

columns.name: NumChildren
columns.description: Number of child activities of this activity.

columns.name: InternalId
columns.description: Unique label for the activity. Field can be null.

columns.name: Title
columns.description: The title of the activity. Field can be null.

columns.name: CompletionThreshold
columns.description: Used to determine when the activity is considered complete. Field can be null.

columns.name: PassingScore
columns.description: Scaled score required to pass the activity, between 0 and 100. Field can be null.

columns.name: PassingScoreUsed
columns.description: Whether the passing score was used to determine the learner success status. Field can be null.

columns.name: ScoreMin
columns.description: Minimum value in the range for the raw score in an activity attempt. Field can be null.

columns.name: ScoreMax
columns.description: Maximum value in the range for the raw score in an activity attempt. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the activity was last modified (UTC).

SCORM Activity Attempts.name: SCORM Activity Attempts
SCORM Activity Attempts.description: The SCORM Activity Attempts Brightspace Data Set lists each user attempt on each activity within a SCORM package, the completion status, success status, and time spent for each attempt.

columns.name: VisitId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the SCORM visit.

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the activity.

columns.name: AttemptNumber
columns.description: Number of the attempt on the objective.

columns.name: Completion
columns.description: The completion status of the learner in this attempt (UNKNOWN, COMPLETED, INCOMPLETE). Field can be null.

columns.name: Success
columns.description: The success status of the learner in this attempt (UNKNOWN, PASSED, FAILED). Field can be null.

columns.name: Score
columns.description: The score achieved by the learner in this attempt, between 0 and 100. Field can be null.

columns.name: ScoreRaw
columns.description: The raw score that the learner achieved in this attempt, between the min and max score of the activity. Field can be null.

columns.name: TimeSpent
columns.description: The time the learner spent in this attempt, in seconds. Field can be null.

columns.name: Progress
columns.description: How much of the activity was completed in this attempt, between 0 and 100. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the activity attempt was last modified (UTC).

SCORM Interaction Attempts.name: SCORM Interaction Attempts
SCORM Interaction Attempts.description: The SCORM Interaction Attempts Brightspace Data Set lists the runtime interactions for each user on the activities they have attempted, including their response and time spent.

columns.name: VisitId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the visit.

columns.name: InteractionId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the interaction.

columns.name: AttemptNumber
columns.description: Number of the attempt on the interaction.

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the activity.

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Point in time at which the interaction was first made available to the learner for learner interaction and response. Field can be null.

columns.name: Response
columns.description: Data generated when a learner responds to an interaction. Field can be null.

columns.name: Result
columns.description: Judgment of the correctness of the learner response (CORRECT, INCORRECT, UNANTICIPATED, NEUTRAL). Field can be null.

columns.name: NumericResult
columns.description: Numeric judgement of the correctness of the learner response. Field can be null.

columns.name: TimeSpent
columns.description: The time the learner spent in this attempt, in seconds. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the interaction attempt was last modified (UTC).

SCORM Interaction Objectives.name: SCORM Interaction Objectives
SCORM Interaction Objectives.description: The SCORM Interaction Objectives Brightspace Data Set defines the relationship between interactions and their objectives.

columns.name: InteractionId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the interaction.

columns.name: ObjectiveId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the objective.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the activity was last modified (UTC).

SCORM Interactions.name: SCORM Interactions
SCORM Interactions.description: The SCORM Interactions Brightspace Data Set describes the runtime interactions that exist in each activity in the SCORM package. Each interaction will only be known after the first user, regardless of role, attempts it.

columns.name: InteractionId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the interaction.

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: Unique identifier for each activity.

columns.name: InternalId
columns.description: Unique label for the interaction. Field can be null.

columns.name: InteractionType
columns.description: The type of interaction (UNDEFINED, TRUEFALSE, CHOICE, FILLIN, LONGFILLIN, LIKERT, MATCHING, PERFORMANCE, SEQUENCING, NUMERIC, OTHER).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Brief informative description of the interaction. Field can be null.

columns.name: Weighting
columns.description: Weight given to the interaction relative to other interactions. Field can be null.

columns.name: CorrectResponses
columns.description: JSON representation of an array of correct responses for this interaction. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the activity was last modified (UTC).

SCORM Objective Attempts.name: SCORM Objective Attempts
SCORM Objective Attempts.description: The SCORM Objective Attempts Brightspace Data Set outputs the score and completion information on every objective associated to the SCORM object where an attempt has been made.

columns.name: VisitId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the SCORM visit.

columns.name: ObjectiveId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the objective.

columns.name: AttemptNumber
columns.description: Number of the attempt on the objective.

columns.name: Score
columns.description: Number that reflects the performance of the learner on this objective, scaled to between 0 and 100. Field can be null.

columns.name: ScoreRaw
columns.description: Number that reflects the performance of the learner on this objective, relative to the min and max scores. Field can be null.

columns.name: Success
columns.description: Indicates whether the learner has mastered the objective (PASSED, FAILED, UNKNOWN). Field can be null.

columns.name: Completion
columns.description: Indicates whether the learner has completed the objective (COMPLETED, INCOMPLETE, UNKNOWN, NOT_ATTEMPTED, BROWSED). Field can be null.

columns.name: Progress
columns.description: How much of the objective was completed in this attempt, between 0 and 100. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the activity was last modified (UTC).

SCORM Objectives.name: SCORM Objectives
SCORM Objectives.description: The SCORM Objectives Brightspace Data Set describes the global, activity, and runtime interactions that exist for each SCORM package. The objectives will only be known after the first user registration or visit.

columns.name: ObjectiveId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the objective.

columns.name: ScormObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier for each SCORM object.

columns.name: ObjectiveType
columns.description: Type of objective (GLOBAL, ACTIVITY, RUNTIME).

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: Unique identifier for each activity. Field can be null.

columns.name: InternalId
columns.description: Unique label for the objective. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsPrimary
columns.description: Whether this is the primary objective of the activity. Field can be null.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Brief informative description of the objective. Field can be null.

columns.name: ScoreMin
columns.description: Minimum value, for the objective, in the range for the raw score. Field can be null.

columns.name: ScoreMax
columns.description: Maximum value, for the objective, in the range for the raw score. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the activity was last modified (UTC).

SCORM Objects.name: SCORM Objects
SCORM Objects.description: The SCORM Objects Brightspace Data Set describes all the SCORM objects that exist, and which course and which topic they are located in. At time of launch, this data set contains data from July 2020 onwards. Remaining baseline data will be filled in upon a future release.

columns.name: ScormObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the SCORM object.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier.

columns.name: ContentObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the content topic.

columns.name: ContentServiceContentId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the associated content in content service.

columns.name: ContentServiceRevisionId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the associated revision in content service.

columns.name: ContentServiceTopicId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the associated topic in content service.

columns.name: Title
columns.description: The title of the SCORM object. Field can be null.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: The description of the SCORM package. Field can be null.

columns.name: LearningStandard
columns.description: The learning standard used by the SCORM content, one of SCORM_11, SCORM_12, SCORM_2004_2ND_EDITION, SCORM_2004_3RD_EDITION, SCORM_2004_4TH_EDITION, AICC, XAPI, CMI5. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the SCORM content was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: User that last modified this SCORM object.

SCORM Visits.name: SCORM Visits
SCORM Visits.description: The SCORM Visits Brightspace Data Set lists each user visit on each SCORM object, the overall completion status, and time spent on the visit.

columns.name: VisitId
columns.description: Unique identifier for each SCORM visit.

columns.name: ScormObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the SCORM object.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: User associated with the SCORM visit.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier.

columns.name: FirstAccessDate
columns.description: The date the user first accessed the SCORM object. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastAccessDate
columns.description: The date the user last accessed the SCORM object. Field can be null.

columns.name: CompletedDate
columns.description: The date the user first completed the SCORM object. Field can be null.

columns.name: Completion
columns.description: The completion status of the user for the SCORM object. One of UNKNOWN, COMPLETED, or INCOMPLETE. Field can be null.

columns.name: Success
columns.description: The success status of the user for the SCORM object. One of UNKNOWN, PASSED, or FAILED. Field can be null.

columns.name: Score
columns.description: The score attained by the user for the SCORM object, between 0 and 100. Field can be null.

columns.name: TimeSpent
columns.description: The amount of time the user has had the SCORM object open, in seconds. Field can be null.

columns.name: Progress
columns.description: How much of the activity has been completed, between 0 and 100. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the activity was last modified (UTC). Field can be null.

SIS Course Merge Log.name: SIS Course Merge Log
SIS Course Merge Log.description: The SIS Course Merge Log Brightspace Data Set returns a list of attempts to merge or unmerge course offerings using the SIS Course Merge tool. This data set only captures data from July 2023 onwards.

columns.name: BatchId
columns.description: The batch ID for this job.

columns.name: JobType
columns.description: What type of job was requested: Merge or Unmerge.

columns.name: Status
columns.description: The status of the job: Started, CompletedWithErrors, Completed, or Failed.

columns.name: OriginalTargetOrgUnitId
columns.description: The target course which the source courses are merged or were originally merged into.

columns.name: OriginalSourceOrgUnitId
columns.description: The source course which is being merged or was previously merged into the target.

columns.name: SourceSystemId
columns.description: The ID of the source system that this course belongs to.

columns.name: NumberOfCoursesInBatch
columns.description: The total number of source courses with the same batch ID being attempted to merge or unmerge. Only shown for course merge jobs with the "Started" status. Field can be null.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: The user who requested the merge or unmerge.

columns.name: ErrorType
columns.description: The type of error that occurred. Possible values: Field can be null.

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: The date and time when the merge or unmerge event occurred (UTC).

Session History.name: Session History
Session History.description: The Session History Brightspace Data Set returns a list of login session histories for all users in your organization. Does not include app usage. The Session History data set and differential is limited to 3 years of data (all of the previous two calendar years and the current calendar year to date).

columns.name: SessionId
columns.description: Unique session identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: OrgId
columns.description: Unique org unit Identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: DateStarted
columns.description: Session start date time (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: DateEnded
columns.description: Session end date time (UTC).

columns.name: LastAccessed

System Access Log.name: System Access Log
System Access Log.description: The System Access Log Brightspace Data Set captures each time a user accesses the system from the LMS via a browser (Brightspace), from the Pulse app (Pulse), or from the Brightspace Parent & Guardian mobile app (BPG-mobile). System access using Brightspace Parent & Guardian is represented in the data set twice: one where Source=Brightspace and one where Source=BPG-mobile. Data from Brightspace and Pulse is available from September 2020 onwards. Data from Brightspace Parent & Guardian is only available from May 2022 onwards. Note: System access begins when the user logs in, returns after 30 minutes of inactivity, or opens the app. System access ends after 30 minutes of inactivity.

columns.name: SessionId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the session.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the user.

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time in which the system access changed state.

columns.name: State
columns.description: Indicates whether a system access started or ended at the reported time.

columns.name: Source
columns.description: Source of the system access. Possible values:

columns.name: AppVersion
columns.description: Version of the app, where applicable. Field will be null for Brightspace sources.

columns.name: Device
columns.description: Device used in the system access. Field will be null for Brightspace sources.

columns.name: IsOfflineMode
columns.description: Indicates if a portion or all of the system access occurred offline with no internet connection. Field will be null for Brightspace sources.

columns.name: IPAddress
columns.description: IP Address at which the event occurred. Field can be null.

User Attribute Definitions.name: User Attribute Definitions
User Attribute Definitions.description: The User Attribute Definitions Brightspace Data Set returns a list of all defined user attributes in your organization. If no user attributes are defined for your organization, the data set will not generate.

Virtual Classroom Usage.name: Virtual Classroom Usage
Virtual Classroom Usage.description: The Virtual Classroom Usage Brightspace Data Set returns information about how Virtual Classroom by Bongo is being used for Bongo Premium customers. The first data point is from July 1, 2018 and the data set will only appear for Bongo Premium customers if there is usage to retrieve. Note: The data includes all Virtual Classroom meetings that have ever been created. Cancelled meetings can be identified using the IsCancelled field, and do not appear in the LTI Links Brightspace Data Set. The Virtual Classroom UI only displays meetings that are scheduled to occur in the future, or have occurred and were recorded. Note: This data set is available as a FULL CSV containing all of the data and does not include a differential. Data is produced on a weekly basis, regardless of whether you purchased the hourly data freshness add-on. Since the data is owned by Bongo, data set generation is done on a region schedule and may not align to existing schedules.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier of the course where the meeting was scheduled. Will be null if the meeting was cancelled.

columns.name: CourseName
columns.description: The name of the course where the meeting was scheduled. Will be null if the meeting was cancelled.

columns.name: MeetingId
columns.description: Unique meeting identifier. If a meeting is reoccurring, each occurrence is represented in a new row.

columns.name: MeetingName
columns.description: The name of the Virtual Classroom meeting.

columns.name: CreationUserId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the user who scheduled the meeting.

columns.name: CreationDate
columns.description: The date and time the meeting was created (UTC).

columns.name: ScheduledDate
columns.description: The date and time the meeting is scheduled to start (UTC).

columns.name: ScheduledDuration
columns.description: Planned length of the meeting in minutes.

columns.name: IsPublished
columns.description: Indicates if the option to automatically publish the recording to attendees is enabled.

columns.name: ExternalLinksEnabled
columns.description: Indicates if the option to use external links to join the meeting was enabled when the Virtual Classroom session was scheduled.

columns.name: WholeClassInvited
columns.description: Indicates if all users in an org unit were invited.

columns.name: IsCancelled
columns.description: Indicates if the meeting is cancelled. Comparable to IsDeleted in other data sets.

columns.name: StartDateTime
columns.description: The DateTime that the Virtual Classroom session was started (UTC). Will be null if the meeting was not started or canceled.

columns.name: EndDateTime
columns.description: The DateTime that the Virtual Classroom session was ended (UTC). Will be null if the meeting was not started or canceled.

columns.name: IsRecorded
columns.description: Indicates if the meeting was recorded.
